title: Fighting Tax Avoidance: Commissioner Moscovici welcomes final adoption of international tax reform package (European Commission) ...
text: ( Source : European Commission ) Pierre Moscovici , Commissioner for Economic and Financial Affairs, Taxation and Customs , has welcomed the final package of Base Erosion and Profit Shifting (BEPS) measures that the Organisation for Economic
